actions.message:
```
?Help                   Lists available commands
?SendEmbed              Sends an embed message
?UserInfo               Displays the user's information
>ChannelInfo            Displays the channel's information
?RoleInfo [role-name]   Displays info for the role
?Slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
?FlipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
?GenNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Why hello there,

If you want to see my Boss or his fellow friends or members in action,
you can go visit their YouTube Channel or Twitch Channel Below

Boss:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBu-C4qvmgYxLReD8DO42zg?

Allan:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWhqfKJQm24MwI5ft1SuohA

Nate VS Gaming:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrqwumqf6BElQBiVqnU-9zg

or you can like the facebook page for updates:
https://www.facebook.com/GroupOfGhostsPHL
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
Hello there,

Some of the members from the E-sports player role or the Certified Wangan Players role
decided to go live in the actual channel. Care to watch, leave the a comment and subscribe?

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBJ37aQ2ObEiTnJiaRe5-pQ

Other YouTube Channels of the other members:

Boss:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBu-C4qvmgYxLReD8DO42zg?

!GetRandomNumber [min-value] [max-value]

actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
{
  "name": "announce",
  "permissions": "NONE",
  "restriction": "4",
  "actions": [
    {
      "info": "1",
      "find": "news",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "channel",
      "name": "Find Channel"
    },
    {
      "info": "1",
      "infoIndex": "2",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "msg",
      "name": "Store Command Params"
    },
    {
      "title": "News Update",
      "author": "",
      "color": "FFFFFF",
      "timestamp": "true",
      "url": "",
      "authorIcon": "",
      "imageUrl": "",
      "thumbUrl": "",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "post",
      "name": "Create Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "post",
      "message": "${tempVars(\"msg\")}",
      "name": "Set Embed Description"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "post",
      "channel": "3",
      "varName2": "",
      "name": "Send Embed Message"
    }
  ]
}
